name: 卡里姆·马尔科姆
name_full: 卡里姆·马尔科姆 Kareem Malcolm

last_movies.title: 我们要一个小小的圣诞节
女巫前线：塞勒姆要塞 第三季
超人和露易丝 第一季

introduction: Kareem Malcolm was born in Savanna-la-Mar, Jamaica, and raised in Toronto, Ontario. After moving to Vancouver, Kareem finally began to follow his love for film and storytelling as an actor.Some of the television shows that Kareem has appeared in include Supergirl, Riverdale, Superman and Lois, Batwoman, Van Helsing, and Altered Carbon. He also appeared in the television movie series Mystery 101 in a recurring role as Russ.Aside from acting, Kareem loves playing basketball and staying active. After playing competitive basketball from middle school throughout post-secondary at Sheridan College and the University of Guelph, his love for an active lifestyle has not faded.
